modName: METRO - Rapid Transit And Player Home
summary: This mod gives the player the ability to use the METRO system, a series of 8 stations interconnect across Skyrim as well as player homes
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives the player the ability to use the METRO system, a series of 8 stations interconnect across Skyrim

The METRO system also features interlinking of player homes, and is itself a large player home in the Passenger Lounge area. Allows the player to make use of transit portals throughout Skyrim. These transit portals transport you to the passenger lounge, your home, and store and showcase your hard earned items.

v3.1 (July 23, 2013) 

+ Includes connections to all DLC, all DLC will be required. 
+ Made it pretty 
+ Fixed fast travel markers for individual stations 
+ Added easy start method. 
+ Removed a few interior doors 

For those few who had a previous version and notice all chests inside the Metro have the red \'steal\' dialogue option, unequip your Metro pass and discard it. Open console and enter \'coc Metro\' this will upgrade you to v3.0 

This will probably be the last update, unless something major happens, if you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me. 



Requires Dawnguard 
-Will cause a Crash To Desktop if not loaded.
-A non-Dawnguard version is coming soon

Compatible with Hearthfires

Features:
-Full crafting center
-Dining and cooking facilities
-Master bedroom
-Grand Hall: For item showcase
-Vault Storage area

I nuked everything, and started over, the old version of this is not compatible with the new one, 
If you are using the old version of METRO, please remove all your items and prepare to vacate your home. Remove the mod, make a fresh save, then load the new version of METRO, replace your items and save again.
I apologize for any inconvenience this revision causes you, fellow gamer.

Please wear your METRO Pass to access the METRO system.

Also On SteamWorkshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=84773158
author: ChanceWolf
